meta.review_title: Vodacom TOBI is a phishing scam
meta.review_content: Do not use the TOBI feature on vodacom contact us website. The TOBI app is a real-time chat app with a vodacom employee. You will be asked to verify your personal details on the chat line : your ID your ADDRESS your BANK ACCOUNT details etc...  You are actually sharing your personal details on an UNSECURED website and your details are NOT ENCRYPTED and thus visible to ANYONE - including hackers. If you have been hacked or a victim of identity theft and you used TOBI app you may have been compromised.
